directions: In a bowl whisk together the mashed whole egg and yolk, the mustard, and the vinegar and add the oil in a stream, whisking until the dressing is emulsified. Stir in the cornichons, the tarragon, and salt and pepper to taste. The dressing keeps, covered and chilled, for several days. Serve the dressing with cold meat, poultry, or vegetables.
ingredients: 1 hard-boiled whole large egg, mashed well
1 hard-boiled large egg yolk, mashed well
2 tablespoons chopped drained cornichons (French sour gherkins, available at specialty foods shops and some supermarkets)
title: Hard-Boiled Egg Dressing with Tarragon and Cornichons
